Title: Provides for the admission of evidence of proof of similar offenses in criminal and civil proceedings involving the commission of a sex offense
Summary: Provides for the admission of evidence of proof of similar offenses in criminal and civil proceedings involving the commission of a sex offense; provides for procedures therefor.
LawCode: Add ยง60.41, CP L; add ยง4552, CPLR
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law and the civil practice law and rules, in relation to admission of evidence of proof of similar sex offenses in criminal and civil proceedings involving the commission of a sex offense
